#summary Developers, patches, help needed.
#labels Featured

Hacked around TextRoom, feeling superior in your coding skills, noticed an annoying bug you could fix in five minutes, or just being helpful? You are more than welcome to participate in any way you can, your help is invaluable.

For more information, look into our [http://code.google.com/p/textroom/w/list Wiki pages]. For lengthy discussions, questions and general wonderments, you are encouraged to use our [http://groups.google.com/group/textroom-discussions General discussions group]. To participate in more specific way, follow the links below:

  * [http://groups.google.com/group/textroom-discussions share the way you use TextRoom]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/textroom/issues/list report bugs]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/textroom/issues/list request features]
  * [http://groups.google.com/group/textroom-discussions offer advise based on your knowledge on C++, Qt, OS integration, usability]
  * [http://groups.google.com/group/textroom-discussions send patches]
  * [http://groups.google.com/group/textroom-discussions/post?sendowner=1&_done=%2Fgroup%2Ftextroom-discussions%2Fabout%3F& join the project]
